title: Why 'Repetition' Will Change Your Belief System | Tom Bilyeu AMA
description: Tom answers questions from the community.  If you want your question answered by Tom in an AMA, Please submit your questions in advance to connect@impacttheory.com, with the subject line “AMA Question”.    Just announced our Comic Book collaboration with Steve Aoki, called Neon Future! Pre-order your copy of the comic book here: comics.impacttheory.com Be sure to follow along with Impact Theory Comics on Instagram as we continue our journey to create a studio that will rival Disney: http://bit.ly/2BwgFam   Impact Theory is proudly sponsored by:   ButcherBox. Use the discount code: "IMPACT" at butcherbox.com to get 20$ off and FREE BACON Skillshare. Start learning on Skillshare today at skillshare.com/impact Athletic Greens: Go to Athleticgreens.com/AMA for a FREE 20 count travel pack and blender bottle (Valued at $99) with any purchase. Blinkist. Visit www.blinkist.com/IMPACT to try out the premium service completely free for 7 days!   PEOPLE MENTIONED Michael Ovitz: https://amzn.to/2MomDKA [9:52]   QUESTION TOPICS Tom explains how to get over self-doubt in financial success [4:46] How to get over the limiting belief that you're too old to do '____' [6:54] Tom gives advice for sticking to routines for those with constantly changing work schedules [11:54] How you can learn to talk as fast as Tom [18:37] How Tom handles fatigue [21:02] What daily practices you can implement to improve your communication skills [24:02] Tom explains how a beginning podcaster can get an audience to listen to them [26:17] This section is about how Tom manages his sleep [27:53]
